TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HtmlInputPassword extends System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText implements class System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler

summary.span: 允许对服务器上的 HTML 元素进行编程访问。

span.span: Allows programmatic access to the HTML element on the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类派生自类，用于创建允许用户输入密码的单行文本框。The class is derived from the class and is used to create a single-line text box that allows the user to enter a password. 使用时控件，属性发布到服务器每次在提交窗体。When using the control, the property is posted to the server each time the form is submitted. 属性控件将不会保留在视图状态。The property for the control is not persisted in view state. 属性指定的最大可以在文本框中输入的字符数。The property specifies the maximum number of characters that can be entered in the text box. 属性允许你指定文本框的宽度。The property allows you to specify the width of the text box. 使用属性来确定用户在文本框中输入的值。Use the property to determine the value entered in the text box by the user. 控件提供事件时引发属性更改发往服务器之间的值。The control provides a event that is raised when the property changes values between posts to the server. 这允许你创建的事件处理程序执行每次引发该事件的一组自定义的说明。This allows you to create an event handler that performs a custom set of instructions each time the event is raised. > [!NOTE] > 控件不提供一种将回发到服务器的内置方法。The control does not provide a built-in way to post back to the server. 必须提供支持回发到服务器，如网页上的另一个控件或控件。You must provide another control on the Web page that supports posting back to the server, such as an or an control. 有关的实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用``， ``，和``以声明方式在 Web 窗体页上的 HTML 控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the ``, ``, and `` HTML controls declaratively on a Web Forms page. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInput_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInput_1/CS/htmlinputcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInput_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInput_1/VB/htmlinputvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何在调用过程中以编程方式添加相同的 HTML 控件`Page_Load`方法。The following code example demonstrates how to add the same HTML controls programmatically during a call to the `Page_Load` method. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInput_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInput_2/CS/htmlinput2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInput_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInput_2/VB/htmlinput2vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 使用默认值初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using default values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数来创建和初始化的新实例控制使用默认值。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the control using default values. 它将创建`password`键入文本框控件。It creates a `password` type text box control. 下表显示的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||"密码"文字字符串。The "password" literal string.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式添加， ，和控件添加到 Web 窗体页使用默认的构造函数来创建一个简单的登录屏幕。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically add , , and controls to a Web Forms page using default constructors to create a simple login screen. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInput_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInput_2/CS/htmlinput2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInput_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInput_2/VB/htmlinput2vb.aspx#1)]

Protected Overrides Sub RenderAttributes (writer As HtmlTextWriter)

span.span: The that receives the rendered content.

summary.span: 将 控件的特性呈现给指定的 对象。

span.span: Renders the attributes of the control to the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法移除`Value`防止呈现，在视图状态集合中的属性，然后调用基类的方法。The method removes the `Value` attribute from the view state collection to prevent it from being rendered, and then calls the base class's method.
